summary: Desperate, broke, and out of ideas, four college seniors start a fake charity to embezzle money for tuition.
cast: Alex Russell|Zachary Knighton|Johanna Braddy|Miles Fisher|Sinqua Walls|Max Adler|Christopher McDonald|Nick Offerman|Rhett James|Chester Rushing|Tracy Smith|Phillip Wolf|Daniel Walker|Lauren Ashley|Lecrae|David Christopher|Chris McNelly|Will Harris|Phillip Rogers|Maximillian McNamara|Stephen Dinh|Jake Uriah Rupp|Heather Rhea|Kristin McKenzie Rice|Gary Teague|Peggy Schott|Elizabeth Lestina|David Tucker|Lesley Ann Rupp|Christopher Sullivan|Emily Yates|Ulysses Lopez|Henry Proegler|Austin Meek|Lawson Hopkins|Matt Owen|Kat Alexander|Maria Engler|Ashley Felkner|Alysia Lucas|Jovan Martin|Michele B. title: Believe Me
